评论详情: These are the perfect addition to my closet. They run true to size and look so expensive. I think they elevate any outfit even though they are a flip flop. They are surprisingly really comfortable- coming from someone who always gets blisters.

I do not have wide feet and my pinky toe hangs off the edge a little, but these seem to be really well made and feel like they have some weight to them. My feet do not slide around and the shoe stays on.
The quality isn’t that bad, but these are way too narrow for me and I don’t even have wide feet! I don’t know who would be able to wear these

评论概述: Very flat and not very wide
评论详情: Very, very flat and not as wide for a standard fit. I purchased two colors and will keep them but probably not order again.
These are so cute and have held up well so far! I reach for them all the time now. I wear 7-7.5 and I got a 7 in these.

The style is just as described. They fit well and are of good quality. It’s a great value for the price. The only issue I’ve had is some pain/tenderness in between my toes. I love the style and will continue to wear them as they’re a little more chic than your average flip flop sandal.

These sandals are pretty basic, but that is the best thing about them. I really do love them very much. Because they are so simple but they're actually quite comfortable. I am pleasantly surprised because I did not expect them to be true to size, but they actually are. They are a leather but they do not get too hot in the summer either. I am glad that I can wear this with multiple outfits. Or even if I am just running. Errands out. I am glad that I ordered them. And I'm pretty happy with the packaging. Because they were individually packaged, but they came right on time.

I absolutely love this slippers. It’s so cute, simple and chic. Looks like it could be designer made. Sizing is true to size but if you’re in between sizes, size down. I’m normally a 7.5 or 8 and the 7.5 was perfect and 8 would have been too big.
